0.name: Foresight
0.Text: Defense: +2 block to this card per opponent card played this turn

1.name: Quick thinking
1.Text: draw X cards based on remaining ap on end turn

2.name: Bob & Weave
2.Text: +3 body dmg next turn. Defense: Dodge head

4.name: Fatal Strike
4.Text: deal 1 dmg to other 2 parts. If you destroy a part, +1 AP next turn

5.name: Counter
5.Text: If opponent play card here, +3 Melee dmg next turn

6.name: Grapple
6.Text: Hit: Enemy next melee card costs +1 AP

7.name: Tight Grip
7.Text: If you’ve played leg card this turn, +3 dmg to gun cards next turn

8.name: Blind Fire
8.Text: randomly Hit head or leg instead

9.name: Limb Wrench
9.Text: Hit: Opponent discard 1 random card in hand

11.name: Sweep Kick
11.Text: HIT: Disable opponent leg for 1 turn

12.name: Feint Shot
12.Text: Deal additional 1 dmg to the other body part

13.name: Blade Distraction
13.Text: Deal 3 dmg to main target, 1 to the other

14.name: Hamstring
14.Text: if opponent has weak here, deal +2 dmg

15.name: stand your ground
15.Text: If opponent play card here, Gain +1AP next turn

16.name: Take Aim
16.Text: next gun card targeting this part deals +4 dmg

17.name: Bring Gun to Fist Fight
17.Text: WHEN PLAYED →  discard a melee card to draw a gun card

18.name: Tactical Reload
18.Text: your next gun card this turn +2 dmg. Defense: Draw a gun card

22.name: Sturdy Bandage
22.Text: apply Weak 2 to targeted bodypart. Defense: Heal this bodypart by 2

23.name: Minigun
23.Text: each pts of dmg is dealt to a random body part

24.name: roll & Load
24.Text: Next gun card +3 DMG. Defense: dodge here

25.name: Piercing Shot
25.Text: Blocked: Deal 2 DMG to this body part

26.name: Cat Stance
26.Text: Melee Combo. Defense: draw a Kick card from anywhere

27.name: Flying Kick
27.Text: Deal +2 dmg per card in hand

29.name: Peparation
29.Text: exhaust. each card deals +1 dmg this game

30.name: Armor Melting Rounds
30.Text: cannot be blocked. Defense: your next gun card cannot be blocked

31.name: Destabilizing Kick
31.Text: Disable this bodypart for 1 turn if it has > 5 hp

32.name: One With Shadows
32.Text: the next card played is invisible

34.name: Smoke Bomb
34.Text: Obscure this bodypart until the end of your next turn.

35.name: Mirror Maze
35.Text: Put a fake copy of this in each other bodypart.

36.name: Feint
36.Text: On reveal: play a 1-AP card in another bodypart

38.name: Vertical Slice
38.Text: Deal 2 dmg to body and leg

48.name: One Step Ahead
48.Text: on hit → their NEXT two attacks are exposed.

49.name: card #49
49.Text: ON HIT → reveal a random card in their hand.

50.name: Omega Throw
50.Text: ON HIT → reveal a random card in their hand.

51.name: Plus One Shot
51.Text: must BE PLayed with another melee attack

53.name: Head Scissors Lock
53.Text: the next card they draw is exposed.

54.name: Roll
54.Text: play a random melee card from your discards, +3 dmg

56.name: WRAPAROUND
56.Text: ON HIT → you Discard a random card.

57.name: takedown
57.Text: melee combo. [You may play a melee card in this same slot.]

58.name: rapid strikes
58.Text: when played → if you have no cards in hand, draw a card.

59.name: push the pace
59.Text: when played → discard a card to play two 1AP cards from your discards.

60.name: disorient
60.Text: WHEN PLAYED → apply WEAK to their head.

61.name: takedown
61.Text: melee combo. [You may play a melee card in this same slot.]

62.name: rapid kick
62.Text: when played → if you have no cards in hand, draw one.

63.name: finishing Shot
63.Text: If they have a weak or destroyed body part, this does double damage
